Aena EMMA Settings Enter a message Nueva encuesta Idioma Cod. de Encuestador XX Aeropuerto Aeropuerto Sistema de Información Código del Encuestador Encuestas Aeropuerto Nº Encuesta FECHA HORA Nº VUELO 1. Could you tell me your NACIONALITY? 2. In which country have you been living for most of the last 12 months? Provincia Localidad 3. Where did you start your journey to take this flight in this airport? Coming from your residence Localidad From a connection Departure airport 4. In what kind of accomodation have you been in your stay in %1$s? Hotel or similar Apartament Second residence Family/friend\'s house Work/business property Cruise Others 5. Could you tell me the LAST MODE OF TRANSPORT that you have used to GET to the airport? 6. where have you left your vehicle? At the airport\'s PAYMENT PARKING(during the trip) At the airport\'s PAYMENT PARKING (while saying good bye to my accompanying person) AREA UP/DOWN passenger NO PARKING, another person has driven it away FREE ZONE OUT of the airport Why? In parked in a PAYMENT PARKING lot outside the airport 7. How many people (friend, family, colleagues, etc.) came to say goodbye to you and entered into the terminal building? None 1 person 2 people People 8. At what time did you reach the airport? Hour Minute 9. Which airport are you traveling to on the flight you are boarding now? 10. Which is the flight number? 11. Are you traveling to the destination airport %1$s simply to transfer or does your air journey finish there? Finish Transfer 11b. Which airline are you following your flight with? 12. At which airport will you complete your air journey? 13. What is the MAIN PURPOSE of your journey? 14. Is this your OUTWARD or RETURN journey? Outward Return 15a. How long will you be away? 15b. How long have you been away? Return on the same day Indicate number of days 15. Including yourself, how many people are TRAVELING in your inmediate group? Traveling alone Two people People 16. How many of them are younger than 15 years? 17. Could you please tell me your relationship with the members of this trip? Relatives (grandfathers, uncles, cousins) Friends/Group of studies Work fellows Others Couple and/or son-daughter 18. How long ago did you book your ticket? Today Yesterday Days 19. What tariff is the ticket you are going to use? First/Business Package Basic Economy Others (free, etc.) Tourist with extras 20. How often have you flown over the last 12 MONTHS without considering this one? (1 viaje = Ida y vuelta) None Number 21. How often have you made the whole same trip over the last 12 MONTHS without counting this? None Número 22. Have you checked in your luggage? Yes No 1 case 2 cases Nº of cases 23. How many people does these cases belong to? One person Two people People 24. Where did you obtain your boarding pass? Airpot (check-in desk or airline) Airpot (check-in machines) Internet (online) 25. To do this route, have you ever travelled by AVE? Yes No 26. To do this same journey, did you use another mode of transport in the last 12 months? Yes No 26a. How many times? 26b. What mode of transport did you usually use? Times Car Bus Train Other 27. Could you tell me the main reason why you have chosen %1$s for this journey? (Just one reason) Total flight duration Proximity to origin/Destination Comfort Safety Economy/price Schedule/Frecuency Personal attention The airport has better communication or better access Airline LOYALTY Program (Getting points on my card) Free Ticket(bought with points, free, etc) Other (please specify) 27. Could you tell me the main reason why you have chosen the PLANE for this journey? (Just one reason) 27. If you had to do the same journey for the same reason, you would prefer to do it by: Airplane Train NS/NC 28. Have you consumed anything in the airport restaurants services (bar, pub, vending machines...)? Yes No 28a. Approximately, how muvh euros have you spent today in the catering services at the airport? 29. Have you bought anything in the airport shop today? Yes No 29a. How many euros have you spent today in the airport shop today? 29b. Could you please state what kind of product you have purchased? 30. Which of the following work situations are you currently in? Employed Unemployed Student Retired or pensionist Housewife 31. Do you work as? Company owner-manager with employees Self employed professional or worker (without employees) Fixed salary employee in the public sector Fixed salary employee in the private sector Temporary or casual worker Other situation 32. What is the main activity of the company or organization you work for? Other 33. Education Primary school/Basic/EGB High school (ESO/BUP/Vocational training Mean grade) Higher Education (University/Higher Technician) 34. Which of these age groups do you belong to? under 15 years 15 to 19 years 20 to 24 years 25 to 29 years 30 to 39 years 40 to 49 years 50 to 59 years 60 to 64 years 65 to 69 years 70 to 79 years 80 to 84 years over 85 years 35. Sex Male Female TAXI CAR Vehicle hired Private vehicle the driver TRAVELS the driver comes to DROP SOMEONE OFF BUS Courtesy bus Public transport bus Other Which ONE? Guardar Others
1. Could you tell me your NACIONALITY? Enter the country 2. In which country have you been living for most of the last 12 months? Provincia Localidad Area
3. Did you arrive to this airport just to do a CONNECTION? Just for a connection Other reasons 4. From which airport have you flown to arrive here? 5. Which airline have you flown with? 6. During the connection, have you had to gather your baggage in this airport and check-in again? Yes No 7. Where did you start your journey to take this flight in %1$s´s airport? Coming from residence Province Locality Beach
8. In what kind of accommodation have you been in your stay in? Hotel o similar Apartment/Property rented Second residence Family/friend´s house Work/business property Cruise Others (Specify) 9. Could you tell me the last mode of transport used for the airport? TAXI Car Rental car Private vehicle The driver travels The driver comes to drop someone off Bus Courtesy bus Public bus Others Specify 10. Where have you left your vehicle? At the airport´s payment parking (during the trip) At the airport´s payment parking (while saying good bye to my accompanying person) Area up / down passenger NO PARKING. Another person has driven it away Free zone out of the airport Other 10b. Why? In parked in a PAYMENT PARKING lot outside the airport 11. How many people (friends, family, colleagues, etc.) came to say goodbye to you and entered into the terminal building? Nobody 1 person 2 people Number of people 12. At what time did you reach the airport? Hour Minute 13. Which airport are you traveling to on the flight you are boarding now? 14. Which is the flight number? Air Line Type the name of the airline 15. Are you traveling to the destination airport %1$s simply to transfer or does your air journey finish there? Finish Transfer 15b. Which airline are you following your fligt with? 16. At which airport will you complete your air journey? 17. What is the main purpose of your journey? 18. Is this your outward or return journey? Outward journey Return journey 18a . How long will you be away? 18b. How long have you been away? Days 19. Including yourself, how many people are traveling in your immediate group? Traveling alone 2 people Number of people 20. How many are under 15 years? 21. Could you please tell me your relationship with the members of this trip? Relatives (grandfathers, uncles, cousins, etc.) Friends/Group of studies Work fellows Others Couple and / or son-daugther 22. How long did you book your ticket ago? Today Yesterday Days 23. What tariff is the ticket you are going to use? Club class/Bussines/First Package (flight+hotel) Basic Economy Others (free, etc.) Tourist with extras 24. How often have you flown over the last 12 months without considering this one? (1 journey = Outward and return journey) None Nº of flights 25. How often have you made the whole same trip over the last 12 months without considering this one? None Number of flights 26. Have you checked in your luggage? Yes No 1 cases 2 cases Nº of cases 27. How many people do these cases belong to? One person Two people More people, specify number 28. Where did you obtain your boarding pass? Airport (check-in desk or airline) Airport (check-in machines) Internet (on line) 29. Have you consumed today anything in the airport restaurant services (bar, restaurants, vending machine...)? Yes No 29a. Approximately how much have you spent today in the restaurant services at the airport? 30. Have you bought today anything in the airport shops? Yes No 30a. And how much did you spend on the airport shops? (Amount in Euros) 30b. Could you please state what kind of products you have purchased? 31. Which of the following work situations are you currently in? Working Unemployed Student Retired or pensioner Housewife 32. You work us... Company owner-manager with employees Self-employed professional or worker Fixed salary employee in public sector Fixed salary employee in private sector Temporary or casual worker Other situation 33. What is the main activity of the company or organization you work for? Other 34. Could you tell me the level of education completed? Primary School/Basic/EGB High school (ESO/BUP/Vocational training Mean grade) Higher Education (University/Higher Technician) 35. Which of these age groups do you belong to? Under 15 years 15 to 19 years 25 to 29 years 30 to 39 years 40 to 49 years 50 to 59 years 60 to 64 years 65 to 69 years 70 to 79 years 80 to 84 years Over 85 years 36. Sex Male Female Type the name of the airport Type the name of the company line Type the name of the town Island Comes in air connection Airport of origin

Comes from home Province Town District Type Town\'s name Type District\'s name Type Municipality\'s name Type Province\'s name 10. In what kind of accommodation have you been in your stay in %1$s? Hotel or similar Apartment/Property rented Second residence Family/friend´s house Work/business property Cruise Others (Specify) 11. ¿How many modes of transport do you have used to access the airport? One mode Two modes Enter the amount of modes 12. Could you tell me the last mode of transport used for the airport? 12b. ¿Could you tell me the first and the last MODE OF TRANSPORT you used to ACCESS the airport? TAXI Car Rental car Private vehicle The driver travels The driver comes to drop someone off Bus Courtesy bus Public bus Bustransit RENFE-T1 Bustransit T1-T2 Cercanías Others Specify 13. Outward journey Return journey 21a. How long will you be away? 21b. How long have you been away? Regreso en el mismo día Nº de días No es habitual que el viaje sea de IDA si el pasajero no viene de su residencia o en conexión aérea. Por favor, confirme esta respuesta. 22. I thought that you had to pay for it Access too complicated Calidad de la conexión I prefer to use my own data connection I don\'t need wireless conection DK/NC 37.
